content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like supermarkets, public transportation, etc. Now, about the rental price, I think 1500 Euros per month would be quite reasonable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I'm not sure if that's within my budget. Can we negotiate a bit?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Of course, we can negotiate. Remember, this apartment is in high demand, so I'm willing to be flexible, but not too much. How about 1400 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm still a student, so I'm looking for something more affordable. How about 1200 Euros?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo, but 1200 Euros is too low for this apartment. The location and condition of the apartment are quite exceptional. I can meet you halfway, though. How about 1300 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 1300 Euros is still a bit steep for me as a student. Would it be possible to go down to 1250 Euros? That would be much more manageable for my budget.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I can see you're determined, Yi-Nuo. But 1250 Euros is still too low for this apartment. Let's split the difference again. How about 1275 Euros? That's as low as I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1275 Euros is getting closer to what I can afford. However, I'm still not sure if I can commit to that amount. Could we perhaps discuss any additional perks or benefits that might be included in the rental price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Well, Yi-Nuo, the apartment is already quite affordable for its location and condition. I can't really offer any additional perks or benefits. However, I can assure you that the apartment is in excellent condition and the location is unbeatable. How about 1280 Euros, and I'll throw in a free parking spot if one is available at the time of your move-in?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A free parking spot would be very helpful, especially since I don't have a car yet. Let's agree on 1280 Euros, with the condition that the parking spot is indeed available when I move in. I agree to the price of 1280 Euros!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1280] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fantastic! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The parking spot will be reserved for you as long as it's available when you move in. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. I appreciate the smooth negotiation process. There's nothing else at the moment. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me. Have a great day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking forward to moving in. If there's anything else I should know about the apartment or the process, please let me know. I'm sure everything will work out. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
